title: Rune Bergström
text: Karl Rune Valerius Bergström (September 5, 1891 – May 7, 1964) was a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who competed in the <a href="1920%20Summer%20Olympics">1920 Summer Olympics</a>. In the <a href="Football%20at%20the%201920%20Summer%20Olympics">1920 tournament</a> he was a part of the Swedish football team that finished in 5th place.
